list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Enhance LLM description handling and improve prompt template service
- Refactored enhance_node_description to utilize a default template for enhancements. - Added error handling for missing templates in the prompt template service. - Updated LLMService to support template-based enhancements with improved parameter handling. - Introduced YAML-based template loading for better flexibility and maintainability.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Python tests.Python tests in calendar_tab_test.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in calendar_test.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.pytest for test_node_operations.TestBaseController.executor": "Run", "Python tests.pytest for test_node_operations.TestBaseController.test_delete_node_debounce.executor": "Run", "Python tests.pytest for test_node_operations.TestBaseController.test_load_empty_state.executor": "Run", "Python tests.pytest for test_node_operations.test_load_node_data.executor": "Run", "Python tests.pytest in calendar_config_dialog_test.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.pytest in calendar_tab_test.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.pytest in test_parser.py.executor": "Run", "Python.Run main.py.executor": "Run", "Python.core.executor": "Run", "Python.main.executor": "Run", "Python.main_window.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "SONARLINT_PRECOMMIT_ANALYSIS": "true", "ToolWindow.Run.ShowToolbar": "false", "git-widget-placeholder": "ai-dev", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/chris/PycharmProjects/NeoWorldBuilder/src/main.py", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "ml.llm.LLMThirdPartyAiProvidersConfigurable", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary: Default task
Implemented a first basic calendar property system.
Made writing and reading of calendar config working
Updated visuals of calendar data.
Updated visuals of calendar data.
Config now works at all times.
Config now works at all times.
Started adding unit tests
Added unit tests for additional calendar components.
Added unit tests for additional calendar components.
We are getting there, got a calendar connection established.
Testing parser
Refactor event component by removing unused UI elements and signals
Add calendar selection and link functionality
Enable calendar link button and improve validation feedback
Enable calendar link button and improve validation feedback
Refactor BaseController and WorldBuildingController for improved structure and functionality
Refactor BaseController methods and add unit tests for improved functionality and error handling
Implement save_node functionality and add unit tests for improved error handling and data validation
Refactor cleanup and error handling methods in controllers for improved resource management
Add ExportMixin for enhanced export functionality in controllers
Add NodeDataMixin for enhanced node data handling in controllers
Add CalendarMixin for enhanced calendar functionality in controllers
Add MapMixin for enhanced map functionality in controllers
Add EventMixin and ImageMixin for enhanced event and image handling in controllers
Add TimelineMixin and TimelineTab for enhanced timeline functionality in controllers. This is the first try to implement a timeline tab. No real functionality for now.
Enhance timeline functionality with improved event handling and visualization in controllers. further debugging.
Enhance timeline functionality with improved event handling and visualization in controllers. further debugging.
Add calendar lookup functionality and improve event data handling in timeline tab
Enhance timeline tab setup and data loading with improved error handling and event processing
Enhance timeline tab setup and data loading with improved error handling and event processing
Fix mouse move event handling to ensure widget updates correctly
Refactor calendar data retrieval to use properties for improved data access, both for setup event calendar and timeline calendar. Works kind of.

Enhance calendar and timeline integration by loading detailed calendar data before timeline events, ensuring accurate event positioning. Update timeline tab to accept calendar data for improved event display.

Enhance timeline widget with detailed calendar data integration, improving event visualization and marker accuracy based on zoom level. Update calendar data handling for better month and day marker rendering.
Enhance timeline widget with improved event update handling and geometry adjustments for better rendering. Add periodic updates to ensure visual consistency.
Fix day marker drawing logic and increase maximum zoom level for improved timeline detail

Add LLM integration and enhance node description handling
Introduced `LLMService` for node description enhancement using an LLM via API calls, with optional contextual data from connected nodes. Updated UI and initialization logic to support the feature. Additionally, removed `requirements.txt` and adjusted project settings for improved modularity.

Add LLM integration and text enhancement UI feature
Introduced `LLMService` for text enhancement using AI via API calls, with support for context-based node descriptions. Updated the text editor UI to include an "Enhance with AI" button and implemented backend functionality for handling enhancement requests. Added configuration support for API key, URL, and model specifications, alongside improved error handling and logging.

Add LLMService for enhanced node description and UI integration
Introduced `LLMService` to enhance node descriptions using AI via API calls, with support for context-based information from connected nodes. Updated the text editor UI to include an "Enhance with AI" button and implemented backend functionality for handling enhancement requests. Added configuration support for API key, URL, and model specifications, alongside improved error handling and logging.
Fix LLM response handling to return empty string instead of None on errors

Add prompt template service and enhanced description feature
Introduced a new PromptTemplateService for managing LLM prompt templates, enabling enhanced node descriptions through template-based approaches. Updated the LLMService to utilize this service, allowing for context-aware enhancements. Added a new UI dialog for configuring enhancement options, including template selection and focus type. Improved error handling and user feedback for empty descriptions.

Add error handling and logging to AI enhancement request process
Enhanced the _request_enhanced_enhancement method to include error handling and logging. Improved user feedback for template service access issues and added logging for exceptions during the enhancement request process. Updated the UI dialog to ensure a smoother user experience when configuring AI enhancement options.

Enhance LLM description handling and improve prompt template service
- Updated LLMService to require valid HTML responses with paragraph tags for enhanced descriptions. - Improved error handling and logging in the AI enhancement request process. - Refactored prompt template service to clarify instructions for generating engaging descriptions. - Adjusted UI to display both current and enhanced descriptions for better user feedback.

Enhance LLM description handling and improve prompt template service
- Refactored enhance_node_description to utilize a default template for enhancements. - Added error handling for missing templates in the prompt template service. - Updated LLMService to support template-based enhancements with improved parameter handling. - Introduced YAML-based template loading for better flexibility and maintainability.

Enhance calendar and timeline integration by loading detailed calendar data before timeline events, ensuring accurate event positioning. Update timeline tab to accept calendar data for improved event display.

Fix day marker drawing logic and increase maximum zoom level for improved timeline detail

Add mixins for node data handling, timeline, and events.
Introduced multiple mixins to encapsulate specialized logic for node data extraction, population, mapping, timeline, and event handling. These mixins enhance modularity and code organization while adding features like calendar integration, map functionality, and timeline events. Additionally, upgraded project SDK and adjusted configuration to support Python 3.13.

Add LLMService for enhanced node descriptions and UI integration
Implemented LLMService to enhance node descriptions using OpenAI-like APIs, with support for contextual depth and asynchronous handling. Updated the UI controller to integrate the enhancement feature and added necessary configurations. Removed unused dependencies from requirements.txt and cleaned up workspace files.

Add LLM integration and enhance node description handling
Introduced `LLMService` for node description enhancement using an LLM via API calls, with optional contextual data from connected nodes. Updated UI and initialization logic to support the feature. Additionally, removed `requirements.txt` and adjusted project settings for improved modularity.

Add LLM integration and text enhancement UI feature
Introduced `LLMService` for text enhancement using AI via API calls, with support for context-based node descriptions. Updated the text editor UI to include an "Enhance with AI" button and implemented backend functionality for handling enhancement requests. Added configuration support for API key, URL, and model specifications, alongside improved error handling and logging.

Add LLMService for enhanced node description and UI integration
Introduced `LLMService` to enhance node descriptions using AI via API calls, with support for context-based information from connected nodes. Updated the text editor UI to include an "Enhance with AI" button and implemented backend functionality for handling enhancement requests. Added configuration support for API key, URL, and model specifications, alongside improved error handling and logging.
Fix LLM response handling to return empty string instead of None on errors

Add prompt template service and enhanced description feature
Introduced a new PromptTemplateService for managing LLM prompt templates, enabling enhanced node descriptions through template-based approaches. Updated the LLMService to utilize this service, allowing for context-aware enhancements. Added a new UI dialog for configuring enhancement options, including template selection and focus type. Improved error handling and user feedback for empty descriptions.

Add error handling and logging to AI enhancement request process
Enhanced the _request_enhanced_enhancement method to include error handling and logging. Improved user feedback for template service access issues and added logging for exceptions during the enhancement request process. Updated the UI dialog to ensure a smoother user experience when configuring AI enhancement options.

Enhance LLM description handling and improve prompt template service
- Updated LLMService to require valid HTML responses with paragraph tags for enhanced descriptions. - Improved error handling and logging in the AI enhancement request process. - Refactored prompt template service to clarify instructions for generating engaging descriptions. - Adjusted UI to display both current and enhanced descriptions for better user feedback.

Enhance LLM description handling and improve prompt template service
- Refactored enhance_node_description to utilize a default template for enhancements. - Added error handling for missing templates in the prompt template service. - Updated LLMService to support template-based enhancements with improved parameter handling. - Introduced YAML-based template loading for better flexibility and maintainability.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Enhance LLM description handling and improve prompt template service
- Refactored enhance_node_description to utilize a default template for enhancements. - Added error handling for missing templates in the prompt template service. - Updated LLMService to support template-based enhancements with improved parameter handling. - Introduced YAML-based template loading for better flexibility and maintainability.
